channel.title: carotenoids on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in carotenoids on funPlantGenes

item.title: LeCCD1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCCD1A Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1A Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 genes contribute to the formation of the flavor volatiles β-ionone, pseudoionone, and geranylacetone.

item.title: LeCCD1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCCD1B Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1B Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 genes contribute to the formation of the flavor volatiles β-ionone, pseudoionone, and geranylacetone.

item.title: Ven1;hyd3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb428470 Gene Symbol: Ven1 hyd3 Gene Name: Vitreous endosperm 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
